info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 16 at 10:13PM CDT until June 17 at 2:15AM CDT by NWS Hastings NE
info.description:
* WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected in the city of Grand Island.
* WHERE...A portion of south central Nebraska, including the following county, Hall.
* WHEN...Until 215 AM CDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas in and near Grand Island. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1009 PM CDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms moving through the area. Total rainfall is expected to be less than 2 inches, but it will fall in a short time and likely cause some short- term flooding within the city of Grand Island. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Grand Island. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM CDT TUESDAY
